alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Forrest; Jones; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 25 at 3:40AM CST until January 25 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT TODAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central, south central, and southeast Mississippi, including the following counties, in east central Mississippi, Clarke. In south central Mississippi, Marion. In southeast Mississippi, Forrest, Jones and Lamar. * WHEN...Through this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Showers and thunderstorms capable of producing heavy rain will continue to move across the area through the morning and into the afternoon. The ground is soaked from recent heavy rainfall, and this additional heavy rain will run off quickly and potentially result in flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
